00022         {

00029         protected void btnResetPassword_Click(Object sender, EventArgs e)
00030         {
00031             Regex regex = new Regex("[A-Z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Z0-9.-]+\\.[A-Z]{2,4}");
00032 
00033             string emailAddress = txtEmailAddress.Text.Trim().ToUpperInvariant();
00034             if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(emailAddress) || !regex.IsMatch(emailAddress))
00035             {
00036                 lblErrorMessage.Visible = true;
00037                 return;
00038             }
00039 
00040             //Test if Email doesn't correspond to an account
00041             IUserRepository userRepo = RepositoryFactory.Get<IUserRepository>();
00042             bool userExists = userRepo.Users.Any(u => u.email.Equals(emailAddress));
00043             if (!userExists)
00044             {
00045                 //Prints success for security reasons (Account Harvesting)
00046                 lblResetEmailMessage.Text = "Success! A new password has been sent if the email provided was registered to an account";
00047                 lblResetEmailMessage.Style.Add(HtmlTextWriterStyle.Color, "Green");
00048                 return;
00049             }
00050 
00051             //Already checked that db entry exists. Now pull the user object!
00052             User editUser = userRepo.Users.First(u => u.email.Equals(emailAddress));
00053 
00054             //Generate Password
00055             string passwordGenerated = Membership.GeneratePassword(8, 0);
00056 
00057             //Work-around for bug in Membership.GeneratePassword() which adds 1 non-alphanumeric character
00058             //Regex regexPW = new Regex("[^A-Za-z0-9]");
00059             //passwordGenerated = regexPW.Replace(passwordGenerated, "");
00060 
00061             //Stores new Password in User table
00062             editUser.password = Security.MD5Encode(passwordGenerated);
00063             userRepo.SubmitChanges();
00064 
00065             //Emails Password
00066             string message = String.Empty;
00067             string from = companyEmail;
00068             string to = emailAddress;
00069             string subject = "Password Reset Message";
00070             string body = "Dear " + editUser.firstName.Trim() + ",\n"
00071                          + "\n"
00072                          + "You have requested a new password to access XYZ Print Shop's website.\n"
00073                          + "\n"
00074                          + "Use the following password to sign on\n"
00075                          + "\n"
00076                          + "Password: " + passwordGenerated + "\n"
00077                          + "\n"
00078                          + "If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at " + companyEmail + "\n"
00079                          + "\n"
00080                          + "Sincerely, "
00081                          + "XYZ Support Group\n"
00082                          + "\n"
00083                          + "ABOUT THIS MESSAGE\n"
00084                          + "This is a service e-mail message from the XYZ Print Shop Website.\n"
00085                          + "Please do not reply to this service e-mail message as no response will be returned to you.\n";
00086 
00087             if (SendEMail(from, to, subject, body, ref message))
00088             {
00089                 lblResetEmailMessage.Text = "Success! A new password has been sent if the email provided was registered to an account";
00090                 lblResetEmailMessage.Style.Add(HtmlTextWriterStyle.Color, "Green");
00091             }
00092             else
00093                 //Will need to be changed to protect against Account Harvesting.
00094                 lblResetEmailMessage.Text = message;
00095 
00096 
00097         }

00099         private bool SendEMail(string from,   // e.g., "sender@csharp-online.net"
00100                                 string to,     // e.g., "receiver@csharp-online.net"
00101                                 string subject,// e.g., "Please read this!"
00102                                 string body,   // e.g., "Thanks for the memories."
00103                                 ref string message)
00104         {
00105             //MailMessage theMailMessage = new MailMessage("administrator@crm.com", "test@hotmail.com");
00106             MailMessage theMailMessage = new MailMessage();
00107             theMailMessage.From = new MailAddress(from);
00108             theMailMessage.To.Add(to);
00109             theMailMessage.Subject = subject;
00110             theMailMessage.Body = body;
00111 
00112             SmtpClient theClient = new SmtpClient("smtp.gmail.com", 587);
00113             theClient.UseDefaultCredentials = true;
00114             theClient.EnableSsl = true;
00115             System.Net.NetworkCredential theCredential = new System.Net.NetworkCredential(companyEmail, companyPassword);
00116             theClient.Credentials = theCredential;
00117 
00118             try
00119             {
00120                 theClient.Send(theMailMessage);
00121             }
00122             catch (Exception ex)
00123             {
00124                 //for debugging purposes
00125                 message = ex.ToString();
00126 
00127                 theClient.Port = 465;
00128                 try
00129                 {
00130                     theClient.Send(theMailMessage);
00131                 }
00132                 catch (Exception ex2)
00133                 {
00134                     //for debugging purposes
00135                     message += "\n<br />Message2:<br />" + ex2.ToString();
00136                 }
00137                 return false;                
00138             }
00139             return true;
00140         }
00141     }
